c03dc739-bf26-4695-a914-f6b1812f433f.content: Implemented session context dedup for membank: added session model/storage lifecycle, session up/tear/reset/info commands, --session/env/session.json resolution, focus/list header-only truncation for served nodes, and integration tests for lifecycle/expiry/override behavior.

06c87f53-1580-4647-9853-6312f27bfb94.content: Update AGENTS membank docs and README with session dedup workflow and command usage.

19ef8b04-08d8-4bab-9b2a-e41b835a1419.content: Updated AGENTS/membank.md and README.md to document session dedup lifecycle (session up/info/reset/tear), resolution priority, truncation behavior, expiry, and command reference additions.

e2ab0340-28e2-40a5-8f1d-84b1194eacb9.benefit: I want federated membank retrieval across repo boundaries so that context discovery spans related projects while preserving relevance
criteria: Read commands aggregate candidates within git boundary
Ranking favors root proximity and host-bank proximity

3866e09e-7069-477a-989c-428107953d78.test_scenario: Given --federated and read commands, discover in-boundary and configured banks and rank merged context
3866e09e-7069-477a-989c-428107953d78.expected_result: Expected result: read-only federated focus/list/get with configurable root/host scoring multipliers

092c1e64-f38a-4079-b848-3f0f10686341.content: Implement federated membank flag, discovery, configurable scoring, and read-command wiring with tests

39cf69a3-1a61-40f9-8a42-5e4b671e93f8.content: Implemented federated read-mode for membank via --federated with git-boundary discovery, configurable federation config, cross-bank scoring multipliers, federated link/list/get/focus wiring, and full targeted test coverage.

6e3011fb-d99b-42e9-9e1b-aa30eccdae13.test_scenario: Given AGENTS membank guidance, document federated mode usage, boundaries, and scoring semantics
6e3011fb-d99b-42e9-9e1b-aa30eccdae13.expected_result: Expected result: practical federation workflow guidance with defaults, safety limits, and config knobs.

e55c96f7-dc14-4a58-9639-95b4b87c0116.content: Update AGENTS/membank.md federation instructions and optimize usage workflow

30174fd6-c365-4e60-ad82-bb94a13f5135.content: Updated AGENTS/membank.md with federation mode guidance, read-only scope, git-boundary defaults, scoring semantics, practical workflow, and config usage notes aligned with CLI behavior.

9b232d39-a29e-4f38-9739-e6aa308d9002.benefit: I want multiple membank sessions tracked concurrently so that context dedup remains isolated by workflow
criteria: Multiple session IDs coexist with separate served history
--session and env overrides resolve active session
Missing referenced sessions auto-create and activate

7b1ec081-61be-43fd-9799-53be07814ac0.test_scenario: Given session commands and read flows, persist multiple session files with active pointer metadata
7b1ec081-61be-43fd-9799-53be07814ac0.expected_result: Expected result: session.json indexes active/known ids and sessions/<id>.json stores served_uids and timestamps

be0b7e58-2314-4f9d-a5dc-95ea3bd434da.content: Implement multi-session storage, command semantics, migration, and tests

1dbfbce3-5b70-4514-b12a-fe6a43e68890.content: Implemented user-level multi-session storage with target-path hash buckets, env override (PVRCLAWK_SESSION_STORE_ROOT), session-scoped recent_uids for --last, legacy migration handling, and updated docs/tests.

bc54b52a-e804-4f3e-8150-b9f1ba3ef62f.content: Session bucket hash must be computed from normalized resolved absolute bank path. On macOS, /var paths may resolve to /private/var, so manual hash checks should use resolved path to match runtime buckets.

d2d09d73-affd-4d08-b843-842a72ef850e.benefit: I want regex-based per-bank penalties in federated scoring so that specific repos can be down-ranked predictably
criteria: Penalty rules match bank path via regex
Ordering reflects per-bank penalty with tests

a46f8c40-9cab-42c3-aaef-1cf2cce4c8f9.test_scenario: Given federated focus ranking and regex path rules, matched banks apply configurable penalty multipliers
a46f8c40-9cab-42c3-aaef-1cf2cce4c8f9.expected_result: Expected result: per-bank regex penalties compose with existing root/host scoring factors

552dc84b-9b2b-4549-ae3a-c5d1a57ee492.content: Implement regex path based per-bank penalty in federated scoring with tests

5a129c7a-3798-4df1-9fcf-30e09c68e3dc.content: Added regex-based per-bank path penalties for federated scoring. New config supports federation.scoring.bank_path_penalties with pattern+multiplier rules that compose with root/host factors; tests validate down-ranking behavior and config roundtrip.
